description: Even highly trained soldiers of death deserve a day off! Ready for a vacation, Bloodshot heads to sunny Puerto Rico for some much-needed personal time. There's no rest for the weary however as Bloodshot quickly entangles himself in a local drug war-- and the beaches run red.
name: Bloodshot's Day Off

description: Who killed the Weaponeer? When a mysterious killer targets the heads of numerous arms-trading families, Bloodshot must protect men with hands bloodier than his own. As an armada of assassins close in, Bloodshot will have to become a one-man army to uphold his mission. But even with all of his training and enhancements, Bloodshot can't possibly prepare for Dr. Silk!
name: Who Killed The Weaponeer?

description: Bloodshot tries getting in the Christmas spirit-- which is pretty hard to do when the entire New York mafia is gunning for you! Convinced that Bloodshot has broken their truce, the Carboni crime family launches another manhunt. But this time, they have something Bloodshot wants. Something worth killing for. Bloodshot's vicious rivalry with the New York mob starts anew!
name: Sins Of The Father

description: War hits the home front when arsonists torch Bloodshot's apartment! But just who is behind this latest assault and why do they have Bloodshot locked in their crosshairs? Bloodshot isn't going to wait to find out. Before the night is through, he'll work his way all the way up the food chain ? and the firebugs are first on his hitlist.
name: The Hunter: The Hunted

description: Bloodshot heads to Russia for a global peace conference--the perfect place to start a new world war.
name: Divided We Fall

description: Suffering from mortal wounds, Bloodshot's life hangs in the balance. Sensing a perfect opportunity to shut down Bloodshot once and for all, the H.A.R.D. Corps strikes at their injured enemy. But, wounded or not, Bloodshot isn't going down without a fight?
name: Coma

description: It's a race against time when deadly nuclear warhead falls into the hands of an international terrorist! With the fate of a continent at stake, Bloodshot must intercept the missile... even if it means sacrificing himself. Can he make it in time or will the world be plunged into an eternal nuclear winter?
name: Download

description:
When tragedy strikes a strikes a circus troupe of clowns, it's anything but a laughing matter! Seeking vengeance on the criminals who wronged him, Uzzi the Clown begins a lethal campaign against crime! But when the flamboyant vigilante crosses paths with Bloodshot, he'll soon realize that the joke is on him.

1st appearance: Uzzi the Clown
name: Tears Of A Clown

description: Ax returns to grind Bloodshot! Back in an remote-controlled suit of armor, Ax will stop at nothing to destroy his most hated enemy! Will Bloodshot's nanite-enriched blood finally belong to Ax? Meanwhile, a storm brews on the horizon!
name: The More Things Change ...

description: Someone has put a bounty on Bloodshot's head and New York's deadliest mercenaries are ready to cash it in! But can theis motley crew of killers stay out of each other's way long enough to kill their actual target? As the assassins begin to turn their guns on one another, no one will be able to save New York from becoming an all-out war zone!
name: Wanted:Dead Or Alive!

description:
Tired, bloody, and angry as hell, Bloodshot sets his sights on the man who ordered the citywide hit on him ? the Immortal Enemy! But Bloodshot's road to revenge is about be cut short when Cinder returns with a deadly new upgrade! Swearing vengeance on Bloodshot for ruining his life, can Cinder do what so many others have failed at? Guest-starring the Harbinger Foundation's black ops team!

1st appearance:

- Phaze
name: A Touch Of Fire

description: The city's newest crime lord is none other than the Immortal Enemy! In order to infiltrate the Enemy's criminal underground, Bloodshot will need the help of Clayton Henry, the recently-blinded Geomancer. You'll have to see it to believe it!
name: The Blind Leading The Blind

description:
When a corporate developer threatens a peaceful circus community, Uzzi the Clown strikes again! And this time, he's packing more than punch lines as dozens fall in his wake! Can Bloodshot stop the merciless vigilante's dark humor one more time or will Uzzi get the last laugh?

1st appearance:

- Monkey Boy
name: Big Trouble In Little Clown Town

description: Uzzi and his Killer Clown Commandos attack! The sideshow freaks of Orchid, Florida are under attack by the mob and only Uzzi the Clown and his fully automatic gags can protect them! But who will protect the mob from this madcap mummer's murderous mania? It'll have to be Bloodshot to the Family's rescue! That is, if the alligators of the Florida swamps don't get to him first!
name: Uzzi And His Killer Clown Commandos!

description:
With his new team finally coming together, Bloodshot and company follow up on a lead about a classified facility in Kyoto. But the secret that they'll find there is much more dangerous than any weapon... What could anyone possibly want with the corpse of the man that created Bloodshot?

Rampage part 1: Bloodshot #27,

part 2: Secret Weapons #20,

part 3: Bloodshot #28,

part 4: Secret Weapons #21,

part 5: Bloodshot #29.
name: Rampage - Part One

description:
Bloodshot out of control! After a botched memory implant, Bloodshot is on an unstoppable rampage and he doesn't care who stands in his way! Now, his former allies have called in the only man with the expertise to stop him-- Ninjak!

Rampage part 1: Bloodshot #27,

part 2: Secret Weapons #20,

part 3: Bloodshot #28,

part 4: Secret Weapons #21,

part 5: Bloodshot #29.
name: Rampage - Part Three

description:
Bloodshot is out of control and on the loose in London! With his nanites still responding to the "rampage" programming, Bloodshot continues to carry out the phantom missions in his head, destroying anything and everything in his path. And now it's down to Ninjak to run one last ditch, all-or-nothing mission to stop him...

Rampage part 1: Bloodshot #27,

part 2: Secret Weapons #20,

part 3: Bloodshot #28,

part 4: Secret Weapons #21,

part 5: Bloodshot #29.
name: Rampage - The Conclusion

description:
Blooshot faces his biggest, most diabolical opponent yet-- Proteus! As Bloodshot works to repair himself from their devestating first encounter, Proteus continues to grow in strength! With abilities like shape-shifting, regeneration, and the power reshape matter, can Bloodshot hope to possibly outpower this machine-made monster?

1st appearance:

- Proteus
name: Enter:Proteus!

description: Showdown in the Arctic Circle! Taking the bait, Proteus has followed Bloodshot to the frozen north. But has the Valiant Universe's most fearsome fighter finally learned enough to finally beat this monstrosity from the future?
name: Shut Down!

description:
Malcolm scores an interview with a vampire! But when he realizes these bloodsuckers are for real, he calls in his old friend Bloodshot for help. Will he get there in time or has Malcolm finally bit off more than he can chew?

Malcolm becomes Vampire.

1st appearance:

- Vampires
name: Vampires In The Village

description:
Bloodshot's closest ally has been infected by a pack of vampires and it's a race against time to save him! Tracking these fanged killers and the source of their mysterious infection will take all of Bloodshot's skill. Will he be able to save Malcolm before it's too late, or will his old friend succumb to the bloodlust inside them?

1st appearance:

- Jack Frost
name: Bloodshot Is Mine!!

description: What is happening to Bloodshot? He's just taken down two thugs at the docks - and now he's ready to take out the cops too! Can Bloodshot regain his senses? Or does the devil inside just found a perfect - and indestructible - new host?
name: Devil Inside

description: Enter Rampage! As Bloodshot lays bleeding, the creature known as Rampage emerges to terrorize the city by night. With innocent lives on line, can Bloodshot contain his nanite-fueled offspring before the city succumbs to his darkness?
name: Rampage Lives!!

description:
Bloodshot hits New Orleans! Sent to the bayou in search of a new designer drug, Bloodshot is about to find himself immersed in a world of magic, murder and mayhem from far beyond the mortal plain. When his contacts start turning up dead, will Bloodshot find himself face to face with a real life bloodsucker?

1st appearance:

- Papa Juju
name: The Blood Is The Life

description: It's Bloodshot versus the undead in the middle of the New Orleans night! Someone close to Bloodshot is drinking the blood of innocents...but who could it be?
name: Lazarus Rising

description: There's a new group of mercenaries on the march! Rampage has teamed up with Laws to take down Bloodshot! Can Bloodshot survive an all-out assault by two of his worst enemies?
name: Mercenaries

description: Bloodshot versus Rampage! The final showdown!
name: Battlezone

description: Bloodshot and MI-6 are chasing the Colombian drug cartels all over London and coming up empty. Bloodshot's convinced they're being setup, but that won't be enough to protect Neville Alcott when the British government calls for his resignation. Will Bloodshot figure who's working against them in time, or will he too fall victim to the ambitions of the new director of MI-6?
name: Things Fall Apart

description: Bloodshot and Juillian Alcott have been betrayed by the new director of MI-6 and captured by the Colombia drug cartel. With Jillian bleeding to death, Bloodshot will have to take the biggest gamble he ever has to save her life. But the price may just be higher than either of them is prepared to pay.
name: Arena

description: To save Jillian Alcott's life Bloodshot has transfused her with his own nanite-laced blood. Now it's only a matter of time before the nanites burn her out like every other Speedshot before her, unless Bloodshot can isolate and crack the original Prising Rising Spirit programming encoded on the Iwatsu Indsutries disks containing the memories of his original life as Angelo Mortalli in time.
name: The Past Anew

description: Jillian Alcott is wanted for murder by the U.S. government. But if Bloodshot can't crack the secrets of the Project Hope and Glory parahuman genetics program he discovered deep inside the original Project Rising Spirit records, and keep the nanites transfused into her blood from burning her whole body out, she won't live long enough to be taken into custody.
name: The Abyss

description: Looking to clear Jillian's name and prove her innocent of murder, Bloodshot follows the real killer's trail back to Japan and Iwatsu Industries. There he discovers plans to put the secrets of the Project Hope and Glory parahuman genetics experiment that saved Jillian's life to work creating another nanite-powered soldier out of Goro Sanada, the Seventh Dragon!
name: The Return Of Rising Spirit

description: With Sanada's transformation complete, Bloodshot and Jillian must contend with the savage Crimson Dragon -- and ensure he's the last of their kind. But when Jillian reveals her startling condition, could more super soldiers be on the way?
name: Enter The Crimson Dragon

description: Neville Alcott returns to enlist Bloodshot on a personal mission against a Russian arms dealer and an old enemy. Of course, things aren't quite what they seem.
name: Casualties

description: Bloodshot investigates mysterious practices at the Alchem chemical plant, leading to nanites and monsters.
name: Badblood - Part One

description: After narrowly escaping the nanite-infused monster, Bear, Bloodshot rallies a siege, and a wolf pack, against the sinister Alchem, another division of Iwastsu-Musashi, the company responsible for Project Rising Spirit.
name: Badblood - Part Two

description: LexCorp's move into Gotham to rebuild means the beginning of the end of No Man's Land, but can Luthor be trusted? Meanwhile, Joker has been out of the spotlight for too long and plans to correct this mistake.
name: Shellgame: Part 1 - Gambits
